sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Import Historic NeedIt Data">6fe99fff47e27510bd8cf164336d4346</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[// Assuming dateStr is "2/4/2024"
var dateStr = "2/4/2024";

// Parse the date
var parsedDate = new Date(dateStr);

// Format the date as "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss"
var formattedDate = ("0" + (parsedDate.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2) + "-" +
                    ("0" + parsedDate.getDate()).slice(-2) + "-" +
                    parsedDate.getFullYear() + " " +
                    ("0" + parsedDate.getHours()).slice(-2) + ":" +
                    ("0" + parsedDate.getMinutes()).slice(-2) + ":" +
                    ("0" + parsedDate.getSeconds()).slice(-2);

console.log(formattedDate);  // Output: "02-04-2024 00:00:00"]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-23 22:50:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>8540e73b47267510bd8cf164336d4322</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onStart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_8540e73b47267510bd8cf164336d4322</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-23 22:50:37</sys_updated_on><when>onStart</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
